hooks.pre-commit: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run compress

scripts.clean: rm -f dist/*.*js && rm -f dist/*.css && rm -f dist/*.zip
scripts.build: doctoc OmniFocus.md && doctoc Roam.md && cp omnifocus/*.*js dist/ && cp *.md dist/ && mv dist/README.md dist/index.md
scripts.deploy: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix dist main`:gh-pages --force
